articles.title: Samsung announces cloud gaming for Tizen TVs, offers no further details
articles.description: Samsung has announced that it’s working on a cloud-powered game platform for its Tizen smart TVs. The company hasn’t said when it's coming or what games it’ll run, but it’s not the first time it’s worked on this tech.

articles.description: It would travel faster and farther than any man-made object we've made thus far.
